name: Decouverte[EN]
description:
In a middle aged-fantasy world where woods, plains and towns surroundings are full of monsters, brave adventurers only can go past city walls in order to explore this huge world.

Gifted with a deep interest for adventure, you could explore a world full of monsters with your village "friend" by your side and meet protagonists as weird as one another.

Something like 5 hours of gameplay.
